DOC.brief_title: Retinal Nerve Fiber Layer Thickness Measurement Parapapillary Atrophy With Cirrus High-Definition ( HD ) Optical Coherence Tomography ( OCT )
DOC.detailed_description: Recently , retinal nerve fiber layer ( RNFL ) thickness measurement use optical coherence tomography ( OCT ) become useful detect glaucomatous damage . However , difficult case include parapapillary atrophy perform measurement . Because RNFL thickness sensitive position measurement measurement RNFL thickness parapapillary atrophy incorrect , difficult determine exact RNFL thickness patient large parapapillary atrophy . In present study , want find proper method analyze RNFL thickness parapapillary atrophy . The previous OCT use fix circle measure RNFL thickness , new spectral domain OCT , Cirrus HD OCT , use movable one . Therefore , may suggest new analysis strategy parapapillary atrophy .
DOC.criteria: Qualified OCT image ( signal strength > = 8 ) Previous intraocular surgery history Media opacity DM
